title: Ranked champion Select
body:
Can we get an option (or have it be default) to not show our pick for "what i want" at the start of our personal picking phase?

I feel it kinda ruins it a lot when i am forced to show that to the enemies even when wanting to swap champs as it causes one of 2 scenarios;
1. Makes me show a possible pick to them (and i have picked counters to my first pick before)
2. Makes it very clear what lane i am.

replies.body: Oh so you're telling me that all the times i see a champ second one in champ select that they managed to pick it in the split second?
That didn't make sense dude lol

Yeah don't know what i typed in parts.

However that said my point is, you can see a person's preference pick, once it is their turn to pick a champ.

Ahh yes right, now I see what you mean. Yes that's true but I don't see the issue? If I picked Ezreal as my "preference pick" at the first picking phase and then it proceeded to hover Ezreal when it came it my actual pick, it would be no different at ALL but if I didn't pick anyone in that first phase and then picked Ezreal in my actual pick anyway
Yes except for in a lot of cases you can give away your role by doing so if you decide to change champions, and that is something that opens you up to counter picking more than normal.
Enemy team has no idea who's where at all, the Syndra you just picked could be for your last pick, the Kench could be going anywhere too

You don't have to pick a champ in that personal picking phase. You can just ignore it, and it will move onto the banning stage. Did it myself numerous times, and have seen someone on my team do it almost every game.
That may be the case, but i shouldn't be forced to not show my team a champion to not show the enemy a champion in preference phase.
you are so clueless mate js
